item.title: JTR Noesis 210HT Speaker Review
item.description: Foreword / YouTube Video Review These speakers were loaned to me by JTR Speakers. Keep in mind that this is a 2022 version so it doesn’t look like the one on the website (as of the time this review was published; hopefully it will be updated soon).
